product_name: KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker with Dancing Fountain Light Show Sound for PC, MP3 Player, Laptops, Smartphone Black
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Speaker are calculated by considering the entire product life cycle. The manufacturing emissions are 5.2 kg CO2e, as provided. For material extraction and processing, additional emissions are estimated at 2.0 kg CO2e, based on the energy-intensive nature of producing plastics, metals, and electronic components. Transportation and distribution emissions are estimated at 0.8 kg CO2e, considering typical shipping distances and modes for electronics from China to global markets. End-of-life disposal is estimated at 0.75 kg CO2e, accounting for recycling and landfill impacts. These estimates follow the GHG Protocol Product Standard for system boundaries, ISO 14040/14044 for life cycle inventory analysis, and PAS 2050 and ISO/TS 14067 for carbon footprint calculation, ensuring all emissions are converted to CO2e using appropriate GWP values.

explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition video card are estimated at 65 kg. product_name: Case for iPad Pro 12.9 2022/2021/2020/2018, Blue Flowers Shockproof Protective Case for iPad Pro 12.9 6th/5th/4th/3rd Gen, [Auto Sleep/Wake] [with Pencil Holder] Adjustable Stand iPad Case Folio Cover
